0.Tweet: Here is one of our #endemics, Typhlops jamaicensis aka #JamaicanBlindSnake/#JamaicaWormSnake that my friend Luke found wandering in his house, looking for ants or a place to escape the heat. He was safely placed back in the wild. Remember to share your nature pics #Roostersworld  https://t.co/VV4uFylGJq
